p.$: Compositions comprising crystalline apixaban particles having a D90 equal to or less than 89 &amp;mu;m, and a pharmaceutically acceptable carrier, are substantially bioequivalent and can be used to for the treatment and/or prophylaxis of thromboembolic disorders.
